entry.title: 'We must continue to invest in the police and the justice system', says Paul Magnette

entry.title: Brussels to Shanghai: Direct flights will resume this summer

entry.title: Prison overcrowding down by 3%, but still over 1,300 inmates too many
entry.content:
Prison overcrowding down by 3%, but still over 1,300 inmates too many

Prisons in Belgium are currently more than 12% over capacity, a significant decrease from the 17% last year. However, the situation for many detainees remains dire.
